text: The Central Zone women's cricket team is a women's first-class cricket team that represents central India in the Inter Zone Women's One Day Competition and Inter Zone Women's Three Day Competition. Team also represented cental India in the now defunct Rani Jhansi Trophy from 1974 to 1997. Central zone has been the most dominant team, especially due to Railways bagging the top players from all regions. Central zone emerged victorious in 7 out of the 8 seasons of the one day competition and won both the first class tournaments. == Current squad == {| class="wikitable" !Name !Domestic team !Birth date !Batting Style !Bowling Style !Notes |- |Shweta Bishnoi |Rajasthan Women |8 December 1992 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm medium pace | |- |Nidhi Buley |Madhya Pradesh Women |14 August 1986 |Left-hand batsman |Slow left-arm orthodox | |- |Varsha Choudhary |Madhya Pradesh Women |6 May 1992 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm medium pace | |- |Bharati Fulmali |Vidarbha Women |11 October 1994 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm medium pace | |- |Samantha Lobatto (wk) |Hyderabad Women |23 September 1988 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm off- break | |- |Mona Meshram |Vidarbha Women |30 September 1991 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm off-break | |- |Nuzhat Parween (wk) |Madhya Pradesh Women |5 September 1996 |Right-hand batsman | | |- |Kavita Patil |Railways Women |27 October 1988 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm medium pace | |- |Sneh Rana |Railways Women |18 February 1994 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm off-break | |- |Punam Raut (c) |Railways Women |14 October 1989 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm off-break | |- |Aditi Sharma |Uttar Pradesh Women |5 August 1996 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm off-break | |- |Shubhlakshmi Sharma |Jharkhand Women |31 December 1989 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm medium pace | |- |Shivangiraj Singh |Uttar Pradesh Women |2 November 1992 |Left-hand batsman |Slow left-arm orthodox | |- |Pooja Vastrakar |Madhya Pradesh Women |25 September 1999 |Right-hand batsman |Right-arm medium pace | |} ==References== ==External links== * Central Zone women's at cricketarchive Category:Indian women's first-class cricket teams
